content: Freedom, calls my name. Serenity, keeps me sane. Happiness, it dulls the pain. Honest, to see my place. Open, to other ways. Willingness, to understand. Justice, but do not judge. Courtesy, for others' flaws. Kindness, it's not that hard. Self-restraint, of tongue and pen. Inventory, my daily friend. Analysis, let down your guard. Look in the mirror, what do you see? The shattered fortress that once bound me.
author: Dream Theater
